level.text: The hearing in commitment proceedings shall be conducted promptly after filing of the petition pursuant to § 7-1303.04(a).
A status hearing shall be held promptly after filing of the petition pursuant to § 7-1303.04(b-1).

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 14-199 designated subsec. (a), and in that subsection, substituted "petition pursuant to § 7-1303.04(a)" for "petition"; and added subsec. (b).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(j) of Civil Commitment of Citizens with Mental Retardation Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14- 383, June 12, 2002, 49 DCR 5701).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(j) of Civil Commitment of Citizens with Mental Retardation Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-454, July 23, 2002, 49 DCR 8096).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.
